<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guided by the Stars](/Feats.aspx?ID=2406) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You are about to attempt a skill check or saving throw.

</column>

---

The stars grant you insights that guide your actions. You roll twice and take the better result. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.
name: Guided by the Stars
